channel.title: Help with playing client please!
channel.description: alright heres the deal... i put my client up and i go on it and when i try to click some where, some times it lets me go there and other times it just closes my client. and it only happens to me, all friends play it but i cant cause of this problem, can some1 help me please?????????????
